basics.name: Karan Kulshrestha
basics.label: Full Stack AI Engineer
basics.summary: Full Stack AI Engineer specializing in generative AI, agentic systems, and production ML solutions. Experienced in building scalable AI applications with focus on financial technology and document processing systems.

work.name: Go India Advisor
work.summary: Designed and developed Stock GPT, an agentic AI assistant built with TypeScript and Next.js, integrating multi-tool calling and deep research across broker reports, earnings transcripts, and quarterly filings. Implemented credit systems and monitoring with Langfuse, driving a 50% increase in paid users.
highlights: Built GPU-powered indexer to extract graphs, images, and data from broker reports with 95% accuracy
Deployed Typesense Vector database with proper data backups and recovery systems
Developed Python scripts for schedulers, data migrations, and backend APIs
Integrated 27+ SQL tables across multiple databases for comprehensive financial analysis

work.name: Bobble AI
work.summary: Worked on content generation pipelines and model deployment infrastructure, focusing on opensource model integration and data processing systems.
highlights: Developed Comfy UI pipelines for content generation
Tested and deployed opensource models including Hunyuan, Ollama, SDXL, and Stability AI models
Built web scrapers for training data collection for YOLO models
Reverse engineered opensource code for background removal techniques

awards.title: DTDL Hackathon Winner
awards.summary: Won $3,400 prize in a hackathon organized by DTDL, a German Telekom company.

awards.title: Multiple Hackathon Wins
awards.summary: Secured winning ranks in 7 different hackathons, demonstrating consistent problem-solving abilities and technical expertise.

awards.title: Open Source Contributor
awards.summary: Contributed to open source projects at a Y-Combinator backed startup.

projects.name: Stock GPT
projects.summary: An agentic AI assistant with multi-tool calling capabilities that processes financial data from broker reports, earnings transcripts, and quarterly filings across 27+ SQL tables. Features credit systems and user monitoring with Langfuse.
highlights: Multi-tool calling and deep research capabilities

projects.name: GPU-Powered Document Indexer
projects.summary: Built a cost-efficient GPU-powered system to extract graphs, images, headings, sources, and company names from raw broker reports. Dynamically scales GPU instances for task-specific processing.
highlights: Dynamic GPU scaling for cost optimization
Visual data search across Indian stock companies

projects.name: Grabup
projects.summary: Founded and led a startup during college focused on building innovative solutions. Gained valuable experience in entrepreneurship, product development, and team leadership.
highlights: Built and launched product from scratch
